body:
### Description

Pasting a long text in import community popup will move the cursor outside of the text area.

https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/47811206/80646676-7cbc-4c9e-b5c4-a89af2df231c

Repro steps:
1. Copy a long community URL (I've used the Status community URL)
2. Go to Communities -> Import community -> Paste the key

Expected:
Since the text is longer than the text area, the area is scrolled down so that the cursor is inside the text area

Actual:
The text area is no scrolled the the cursor is outside of text area
